# How does this work?

The goal of this script is to take our cell-specific rates of C-assimilation and scale them up. Specifically, we are curious about m/km-scale models of C assimilation/H2 utilization.

1.  We begin by importing the data output from `03_nanoSIMS_processing.qmd` and summarizing it by depth and well type.
